key.name: The Alliance needs you! Press the ( ! ) balloon over your character's portrait.
$MyPCName$, it's time for your assessment.
All systems green! Sorties are now available from the hologlobe!
Overlook to Sapling One, mission is a go!
Sapling One? Hahaha! Is that a Green Hoods call sign?
Laugh all you want, I'm sure it's cuter than whatever Dark Wind uses!
...Cuteness doesn't factor into Dark Wind tactics.
Mission complete! Come on home to Sky Fortress!
Open the Reputation window to see your standing with each faction.
You can find Field Missions on the World Map anytime.
My turn! Over here, cutie.
Good work! Return to the ship!
Click where the arrow is pointing!
Hey cadet! Over here, I've got something to tell you!
$MyPCName$, I've received your evaluation reports. Let's have a brief chat.
Open your inventory and activate the support flare you've received to call for assistance.
Open your inventory and activate the support flare you've received to call for assistance.
Open your inventory and activate the support flare you've received to call for assistance.
Open your inventory and activate the support flare you've received to call for assistance.
Open your inventory and activate the support flare you've received to call for assistance.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23000094$</font> is approaching Sky Fortress at high speeds! He's trying to board the ship!
The crew of this ship is so spoiled with their air transports! Back in my day, you made a grueling trek on horseback, just like everybody else!
While you're in the neighborhood, why don't you check up on Frey? I worry about leaving the empress's safety in the hands of someone so young.
Remember, all you need to do is power up the generators and insert that data disk into the comms array. We'll take care of the rest from here.
If we don't do anything, those Prizboxes will jam our transmission. I think it's time they were decommissioned, don't you agree?
While you're down there, why don't you do something about those berserk robots, so they don't damage the comms array?
Did you get the ledger? Head back to the ship so we can take a look!
Any luck with the ledger? Report back to Sky Fortress when you can.
Before we begin our investigation, we must secure the area. I trust you know what to do?
I'm detecting a $npcName:11003781$ in your vicinity! Be careful!
The goal of this exercise is to acclimate your body to extreme temperature conditions, but don't overdo it! If you're feeling faint, return to the ship.
Are you giving up? You're pathetic! If you can't kill it, keep on hitting it 'til it wishes it were dead! What do you mean I'm too harsh? Let go—*bzzt*
$MyPCName$, I've been monitoring remotely. There may be a solution to our quandary. Return to the carrier with $npcName:11000144$, and join me and the officers in the briefing room.
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
You're ready to raise your job rank!
The quest to unlock your master skills awaits! Press the ( ! ) balloon over your character's portrait.
There's work to be done in Kritias. Speak with our officers.
$MyPCName$, the Empress has an urgent message for you! Click the ( ! ) Quest Notifier over your character's portrait.
It's me, $npcName:11004288$! I've got something to tell you, so check out the "!" chat bubble!
$MyPCName$, $npcName:11004614$ has an urgent message and wants you immediately in $map:52100109$. Click the ( ! ) balloon over your character's portrait.
You can start a new epic quest. Click the ( ! ) balloon over your character's portrait.
나의 반신이시여, 드릴 말씀이 있습니다. ( ! ) 말풍선을 통해 저에게 말을 걸어주세요.
$MyPCName$! 날세! 균열의 힘이 더욱 강해졌네. 어서 여제님의 침실로 와주겠나? 기다리고 있겠네!
$MyPCName$, the lady is looking for you. Please come and visit the Frontier Foundation Mansion…
$MyPCName$님, 아가씨께서 또 다시 긴히 찾으십니다. 과연 이 일을 제대로 할 수 있을지 모르겠군요. 일단 프론티어 재단 저택으로 방문해 주시길….
